conbody.p: A Select (or Drop-down list) allows you select an item from a list of defined items. Normally, the locator of a select is similar to that of a textboxâ€”the difference is on the tag: it uses 'select' tag instead of 'input'.
conbody.codeblock: <label for="tl0023">Priority</label> <select class="select aui-ss-select" id="tl0023" multiple="multiple"> <option class="imagebacked" value="10000">Blocker</option> <option class="imagebacked" value="1">Highest</option> <option class="imagebacked" value="2">High</option> <option class="imagebacked" value="3">Medium</option> <option class="imagebacked" value="4">Low</option> </select>
